original: 荊州襄陽人，即龐山民，龐德公之子、龐統族兄。龐休之名乃本作假托杜撰。與其父同為荊襄一帶名士，娶諸葛亮姐為妻。後出仕曹魏。
text: People from Xiangyang, Jingzhou, namely Pangshanmin, son of Lord Pang De and brother of Pangtong clan. Pang Xiu's name is a fake. He was a celebrity in the Jingxiang area with his father and married sister Zhuge Liang as his wife. Later, he served as Cao Wei.
